recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM AND OPINION, ORDER the Court GRANTS Moore's application.  The Court will issue a writ a habeas corpus to respondent Doug Dretke ("the Director"), enjoining him from executing Moore.  The Court will issue a writ of habeas cor pus to the Director, directing him to release Moore from custody unless the State of Texas, within 180 days, either permanently stays Moore's execution or reforms his sentence to life imprisonment.  Signed by Judge Leonard Davis on 7/1/05. (fnt, ) Additional attachment(s) added on 7/5/2005 (fnt, ).
